Class Position

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Canvas
              |
              +--Position
public class Position
extends java.awt.Canvas

This class implements a position of the game of Othello. A position can be in either of 3 states: empty or occupied by either player. When occupied, a position is rendered as a circle either black or white.

See Also:
